title: Heavy Metal F.A.K.K. 2 Playthrough ‚Äî Part 1
description: This game was made in 2000 by Ritual Entertainment who made a few other games I've played (Quake Scourge of Armagon, SiN, Blair Witch 3) and is on the idtech3 engine. It's an interesting game. The plot and characters seem like they were thought up by a 13 year old, but that's okay I guess. For 2000 the game is pretty, and although the controls are clunky as hell it's still surprisingly fun.
